about_the_game:
CivIdle's base game is completely free. However, running the game's server costs money and if you'd like to help me keep the game's server running, you can purchase this optional supporter pack.

In-Game Benefits

  • A unique badge for supporter pack owners that is shown in the in-game chat, player trades and world trade map tile
  • Choose a custom color for your name in the in-game chat and the trade map tile
  • Your name will appear in the wonder Hagia Sophia (three random supporters will be shown every time the wonder is clicked)
  • You can skip the antibot/spam play time requirement (48-hour play time) when upgrading from Tribune to Quaestor

Every week, one of the supporter maps is available for all players. As a supporter pack owner, you have access to all supporter maps at any time

Supporter Map: American

  • Unique Buildings: Broadway (Railway), Wall Street (Capitalism), The Pentagon (Rapid Fire), Research Fund (United Nations)
  • Natural Wonders: Grand Canyon, Niagara Falls
  • Unique Tech Multipliers: Skyscraper
  • Great People: George Washington
  • Festival: Thanksgiving: Wall Street provides double the boost to buildings and applies to Mutual Fund, Hedge Fund and Bitcoin Miner, and +5 Production Multiplier to Research Funds

Supporter Map: Babylonian

  • Unique Buildings: Wall of Babylon (Land Trade), Tower of Babel (Religion), Ziggurat of Ur (Theater)
  • Natural Wonders: Euphrates River, Zagros Mountains
  • Great People: Samsu-iluna
  • Festival: Akitu: Ziggurat Of Ur and Euphrates River apply to buildings unlocked in the current age

Supporter Map: Japanese

  • Unique Buildings: Itsukushima Shrine (Religion), Golden Pavilion (Theocracy), Osaka Castle (Electricity)
  • Natural Wonders: Kanagawa, Mount Fuji
  • Great People: Oda Nobunaga
  • Festival: Aoi Matsuri: Mount Fuji generates double the warp

Supporter Map: German

  • Unique Buildings: Cologne Cathedral (Holy Empire), Elbphilharmonie (Skyscraper)
  • Natural Wonders: Zugspitze, Rhine Gorge, Black Forest
  • Great People: Otto von Bismarck
  • Festival: Oktoberfest: Double the effect of Zugspitze

short_description: CivIdle is an idle/incremental game that allows you to lead your own civilization through thousands of years from ancient times to the modern era. Expand your territory, explore a vast tech tree, build various wonders, and trade with global players: empire must grow and numbers must go up!
